info.name: Tumblr Font Fix
info.description: Tumblr is set to have a default font of Helvetica Neue which I discovered when I downloaded it for my computer a few days ago. Maybe I didn't download the version Tumblr developers have because it looks like shit on the Dashboard. I know mac might look prettier with it, but not windows. So, anyway. I basically just deleted all instances of "Helvetica","Helvetica Neue". So it's either, Arial or sans-serif where it would be Helvetica. There's font options. Let me know if you want more options. I'll add them. -Talon (c)
info.additionalInfo: v0.0.1 This is the beginning. If you need help hit me up and I'll whip something up for you. I'm a nice guy. -Talon (c)
